scene: A whimsical, pastel-toned bar where a smiling cartoon cat wearing a tiny bow-tie is drinking a tiny soda with a straw labeled “(he) is drinking,” while a neon sign above the counter flashes “(you) are drinking,” a chalkboard lists “(he) drinks” beside frothy mugs, shelves of crusty bread loaves spell out “the bread,” the bartender is a cheerful robot holding a silver tray of cake slices shaped like the word “cake,” a pink speech bubble over a girl in the corner reads “your cake?” and another bubble for the robot says “her cake,” a perched parrot on a bottle squawks “(it) eats,” a wall poster asks “(?) do you eat”

A luminous, story-book street party at twilight where an apologetic robot wearing a sash that says “EXCUSE ME” raises a glowing neon sign reading “EXCUSE!” beside a mime handing out cards printed “I excuse / he excuses / she excuses / it excuses / you excuse,” while a smiling cat in a tiny bow-tie holds a banner “SORRY – I AM SORRY” next to a juggler whose spinning plates spell “THANKS” and “THANK YOU,” a floating piñata shaped like a glittering “PARTY PIECE” bursts open releasing confetti of star-shaped letters “GOOD NIGHT,” a lamppost banner flutters “GOOD EVENING

Whimsical cartoon breakfast scene: a cheerful red apple wearing a tiny “sorry, excuse me, pardon” bowtie politely steps aside to let a block of smiling cheese speak at a toy-town lectern; hovering speech bubbles show “I am talking”, “you’re”, “aren’t being”, “are you?” and “good morning”, while a sun-shaped microphone labeled “speak” beams rays over the playful food characters.

definition5: nice to meet you, so nice to meet you
scene: A smiling little daughter in a polka-dot dress rolls one bright red suitcase across a sunlit airport gate, while she waves a juice carton that reads “(I) drink” and holds a tiny comic-book speech-bubble saying “nice to meet you”, a friendly child-sized cartoon girl beside her flashes a matching speech-bubble that says “so nice to meet you”, and a big chalkboard sign overhead shows the words “a”, “an”, and “(I) am drinking”, the whole scene warmly lit and softly cartoon-realistic --ar 3:2 --v 5

A smiling young woman steps out of a candy-pink art-deco hotel at golden hour, waving goodbye to her best friend who stands beneath neon “ARE YOU COMING?” and “IT'S ADVENTURE TIME!” signs; a suitcase beside her sprouts a speech-bubble luggage tag that reads “YOU'LL LOVE WHERE SHE'LL TAKE YOU,” while above the entrance a marquee flickers “HOTELS OF HEART,” and chalked on the sidewalk in looping script is “SHE IS MAGIC, YOU ARE THE JOURNEY,” all bathed in warm sunset pastels and whimsical Disney-style illustration --v 5 --ar 3:2

A colorful, cartoon-style outdoor café terrace at golden hour, where an excited green parrot perched on a retro red phone casually held in a smiling girl’s hand is cheerfully “talking” through comic-book speech bubbles that read “HELLO? HI! DO YOU SPEAK…?” while a friendly robot waiter on roller skates presents a steaming plate of noodles as a sign on the tray says “(I) EAT / (I) AM EATING — PLEASE LIKE!”, all beneath a cheerful neon banner strung between lampposts that repeats the word “SPEAK” in glowing letters, with tiny illustrated doodles of mouths and phones floating around like confetti, ultra-vivid, whimsical, cinematic lighting, 3D

Inside a cozy vintage bar labeled “THE BAR,” a joyful man is drinking a bright soda, while across from him a mirror-like poster shows “YOU ARE DRINKING” reflecting you; on the counter his glass says “HE DRINKS,” beside a warm loaf of bread, a slice of cake with “HER CAKE,” and a cheeky raccoon that (it) eats crumbs; a speech-bubble chalkboard asks “DO YOU EAT?” and a smiling woman answers “YES” as she eats; neon signs flash “YOUR BREAD” and “YOURSELF,” and the bartender gestures toward a tiny sign on the cake that reads “FOR YOURSELF.”
